content: Produce a list of 25 words that end with 'tion'.

Certainly! Here is a list of 25 words that end with "tion":

1. Information
2. Education
3. Celebration
4. Application
5. Communication
6. Imagination
7. Vacation
8. Station
9. Situation
10. Operation
11. Nation
12. Relation
13. Creation
14. Donation
15. Foundation
16. Invitation
17. Orientation
18. Passion
19. Population
20. Revolution
21. Solution
22. Transportation
23. Vacation
24. Vision
25. Attention

I hope this list meets your requirements! Please let me know if you need any further assistance.
